data.message: You utter sell out fuck! I have loved you since day 1, now your mouth is dripping with political cum, you made us think you were unique, now you're just part of the criminal elite, I hope you find this message and it makes you incomplete, when you began you were from the street. You've left us today amidst the constant tension, I hate your new direction, I can rhyme the word orange.. Marshal you're really foreign to what you was originally spawning, no? Wait you have no weight your sick and falling.  You've become the rich bitch with a poison on tongue. We love d12 they stood by your side  The tragedy is your now on the wrong side, the side that hated you has turned full screw, you decided to be a benefactor of the countries demagrapher? You fucked us all we want to say.... You made that choice now fuck off and have a nice day.
